messages.title: Competent leadership or Coalition of Chaos
messages.content: Job total hits record high while wages surge or Coalition plan to borrow risks £170bn extra debt. Tax cuts for workers and savers. You're getting £10 off a tank with the Tories. The deficit down, income tax cut, more jobs, new businesses. A better future for you, your family and Britain.

messages.title: Coalition of Chaos
messages.content: Labour set to borrow risks £170bn extra debt. We'll hold Labour to ransom - SNP. Labour is plotting Scottish alliance. Spending up, more debt, higher taxes, jobs lost. Bosses que up to warn: Miliband will bankrupt Britain.

keyPolicies.policyDescription: Anna FIRTH is fighting for more support for families, carers & pensioners.
She advocates for a referendum on Europe & controlled immigration.
She aims to create more jobs, lower taxes & improve public transport.

images.caption: Anna Firth portrait on campaign leaflet.

leaflet.additionalNotes: Leaflet contrasts 'Competent leadership' with 'Coalition of Chaos', associates Labour with high borrowing, SNP alliance, and fiscal instability, while promoting Conservative outcomes like job growth, tax cuts, and new businesses.
